BIO

Sqreem Technologies

Backend Developer (AUGUST 2020 - PRESENT)

Design and develop software applications for commercial and internal use within the stated timeline. Design and develop UI/UX of the software applications Design and develop software applications using the implemented tools which includes but not limited to: (Programming LanguagesIntegrated Development Environment (IDE), Operating System, System Development Life Cycle). Provide proper documentation of the design, infrastructure, usage and maintenance of the software applications including but not limited to: Process Flow, Entity Relationship Diagram, API and Infrastructure, LoFi UI/UX Design, HiFi UI/UX Design, Test Releases, Live Releases, System Manual. Perform software application maintenance which includes but not limited to: Fixing errors of the software applications. Development of the new software features. Develop software modules. Perform unit tests. Adhere to company coding standards. Report development status. Provide information to immediate superior by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing development and service issues. Recommend new development tools, programming techniques, procedures, policies, and computing equipment to immediate superior.
